question_text: You're planning a perfect weekend. Which activities would you include? (Select all that apply)
scenario: You have a completely free weekend with no homework or obligations. You can choose how to spend your time.

options.text: Working on a DIY project or fixing something
Creating art, music, or writing stories
Reading about interesting topics or doing experiments
Hanging out with friends or helping in the community
Planning and organizing a party or event
Organizing your room or creating study schedules

question_text: Which summer activities would you sign up for? (Select all that interest you)
scenario: Your community center is offering various summer programs. You can choose multiple activities.

options.text: Art, music, or creative writing camp
Office skills or computer applications course
